title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Tic Tac Toe is a React-based two-player game with a user-friendly interface and interactive  game-play. It showcases my skills in responsive design and state management, and JavaScript.

title: Password Generator
description: Password Generator is a tool created to generate secure and random passwords. It features customizable options for password length and character types.

title: To-do List
description: Todo List is a React-based application enhanced with npm packages to manage tasks efficiently. It offers features like task creation, deletion, and completion tracking

title: Devdetector App
description: Devdtector uses React and GitHub API to search and display user profiles dynamically. It demonstrates real-time data fetching and showcases my skills in React development and API integration.

title: Nihal Import
description: It presents a high-end sugar replacement solution and offers comprehensive details, advantages, and usage advice. The website's design places a strong emphasis on easy navigation and a clean look.
